DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study ask whether treat non-diabetic chronic kidney disease ( CKD ) patient GFR 8-20mL/min/1.73m2 darbepoetin Alfa target Hb 11.0 13.0g/dL preserve renal function well target Hb 9.0 and11.0g/dL . The investigator also ask whether high Hb target 11 13g/dL cause high adverse event regard cardiovascular disease compare low Hb target 9 11g/dL .

DOC.detailed_description: Anemia common among patient chronic kidney disease ( CKD ) associate increase risk cardiovascular renal event . Although erythropoiesis stimulate agent ( ESA ) use correct anemia , use ESA ( hemoglobin level approximately 13 g/dL ) reduce cardiovascular renal event diabetic CKD patient . Subgroup analysis recent randomize study suggest use darbepoetin alfa target Hb 11 13 g/dL may preserve renal function well target Hb 9 11g/dL non-diabetic CKD patient .
